results.title: Generalized anxiety disorder: new concepts and psychopharmacologic therapies.
results.text_hl: Because @CHEMICAL_Buspirone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002065 @@@buspirone@@@ has no significant interactions, it does not prevent @CHEMICAL_Benzodiazepines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001569 @@@benzodiazepine@@@ withdrawal and cannot be directly substituted for this class of medications. beta-Blockers are used when @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular symptoms@@@ and @DISEASE_Tremor @DISEASE_MESH:D014202 @@@tremor@@@ are prominent, for stage fright (@CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@) and possibly for @<m>DISEASE_Phobia_Social</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072861 @@@social phobia@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).
